newsitem.title: UK: LCE white sugar ends easier.
newsitem.headline: LCE white sugar ends easier.

text.p: London white sugar futures ended easier but off the lows in light Thursday trade, rangebound on a lack direction either from physical news or New York.
October last traded down $1.80 at $351.60. December was off $0.40 at $346.40. Volume totalled 1,539 lots.
Traders said while there was interest to deal the nearby October/December spread, actual trades looked thin.
Congestion seemed to ease at Brazil's Santos port where Lloyds Shipping Intelligence said nine vessels loading sugar were berthed after nearly double that number two weeks ago.
